text: Treatment of stage III mycosis fungoides is palliative (to relieve symptoms and improve the quality of life) and may include the following:         -  PUVA therapy. Systemic chemotherapy or biologic therapy may also be given.    -  Extracorporeal photochemotherapy.    -  Radiation therapy.    -  Topical corticosteroid therapy.    -  Retinoid therapy.    - Systemic chemotherapy with one or more drugs. Topical chemotherapy or radiation therapy may also be given.    - Topical chemotherapy.
